name: TACOMA
summary: Tacoma is a sci-fi narrative adventure set aboard a high-tech space station in the year 2088. Explore every detail of how the station’s crew lived and worked, finding the clues that add up to a gripping story of trust, fear, and resolve in the face of disaster. From the creators of Gone Home.
info:
• 开发: Fullbright
  • 发行: Fullbright
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One

  • 发行日期: 2017年8月2日
